item.title: Building a Knowledge Handling Set Up - Part 1 - Introduction
item.description: Building a Knowledge Handling Set Up - Part 1 - Introduction Intro Today I’m kicking off a series on building a Knowledge Handling Set Up (KHS). There are many tools, frameworks, and ways of working out there for learning and holding onto knowledge, and it can be hard to fit them together into a whole that works for you, what I call a KHS. This series is a bit unlike some of my others, in that I’ll be working it it out as I go.
